text: @Milbank Didn’t you also call Trump a racist for his actions 1/31 regarding CoronaVirus? If you called him a racist then you’re the one that thought the CoronaVirus is a hoax. What’s not a hoax is the fact that all most all of our medical supplies come from China. Ever think of that Dana?

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
